examples.example: 人生中总会有那么一段美好的回忆，让人每每想起都倍感温馨。

translate.english: There will always be such a beautiful memory in life, which makes people feel very warm every time they think of it.

examples.example: 我和他曾有过一段非常难忘的旅行经历，那是我们珍贵的回忆。

translate.english: I and he once had a very unforgettable travel experience, and that was our precious memory.

examples.example: 在人生的旅途中，我们总会经历一段充满惊喜和挑战的时光，让我们不断成长和进步。

translate.english: In the journey of life, we will always experience a period of time full of surprises and challenges, which enables us to continuously grow and progress.
